data.title: Department of Emergency Medicine
data.meta_description: Since 1981, the University of Pittsburgh Emergency Medicine residency has graduated over 400 physicians who serve nationwide in academic and community settings.Â  Leadership positions currently held by our graduates include:
data.text:
Since 1981, the University of Pittsburgh Emergency Medicine residency has graduated over 400 physicians who serve nationwide in academic and community settings. Leadership positions currently held by our graduates include:

Three Chief Medical Officers (Northwestern, University of Arizona/Maricopa, Emory)

One current and one immediate past School of Medicine Deans (Albany, Tennessee-Chattanooga)

Recent two SAEM Leadership Awardees and previous recipients of all major SAEM and ACEP awards

19 current or former EM Academic Department Chairs (more than any other US EM unit)

Editors of 2 of 3 major EM texts, two highest impact EM journals, and the highest impact EMS journal

One U.S .House of Representatives Member

Many Recipients of ACEP Research, Education, and EMS awards, and SAEM Leadership and Hal Jayne/Academic Excellence Awards

One health services company CEO
